remarks: Anything times the zero vector is the zero vector.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsz.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvsz.6 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
nvsz $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC ) -> ( A S Z ) = Z ) $.
